# subscript(_:)

**Instance Subscript**

Accesses a contiguous subrange of a collection of button elements.

## Declaration

```swift
subscript(elementName: GCButtonElementName) -> T? { get }
```

## Accessing elements by name

- **subscript(_:)**: Accesses a contiguous subrange of a collection of direction pad elements.
- **subscript(_:)**: Accesses a contiguous subrange of a collection of axis elements.
- **subscript(_:)**: Accesses a contiguous subrange of a collection of switch elements.
- **subscript(_:)**

items.description: Accesses a contiguous subrange of a collection of direction pad elements.
items.name: subscript(_:)

items.description: Accesses a contiguous subrange of a collection of axis elements.
